Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

tidyheatmaps (development version)

tidyheatmaps 0.2.1

CRAN release: 2024-02-29

  • Minor adjustments for CRAN submission.

tidyheatmaps 0.2.0

  • tidy_heatmap() was renamed to tidyheatmap(). tidy_heatmap() still works, but will be deprecated in the future.

tidyheatmaps 0.1.0

  • Initial release. tidyheatmaps simplifies the generation of publication-ready heatmaps from tidy data. By offering an interface to the powerful pheatmap package, it allows for the effortless creation of intricate heatmaps with minimal code.
